Package mystars.notifications

Class EmailNotifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • mystars.notifications.EmailNotifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INotifyStudent
    public class EmailNotifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements INotifyStudent
    This class sends an email to the student to notify them of changes to their course registration.

        smtpHost - The SMTP hostname.
